tool_description: Calculates precise astronomical positions of celestial bodies for a given birth date, time, and location using ephemeris data.

latitude.description: Birth location latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Birth location longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for birth_date and HH:MM:SS for birth_time.
Coordinates out of range: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid timezone: Use a valid timezone identifier from the IANA timezone database.
Ephemeris data unavailable: The requested date is outside the available ephemeris range (typically 1800-2200).
usage: Provide complete birth data including date, time, coordinates, and timezone. The tool calculates positions for all major planets and points used in natal astrology.

calculation_timestamp.description: UTC timestamp when calculation was performed

planet_names.description: List of calculated celestial bodies (Sun, Moon, Mercury, etc.)
